title.rendered: Swanky Basement Ground Triplex & First and Second Floor In Shanti Niketan

content.rendered:
Located in the prime location of South Delhi this tasteful development encompasses a Majestic Basement Ground Triplex with lavish amenities like a swimming pool, spa & sauna, gymnasium, home theatre, etc, and Opulent First & Second Floor with High-End Specifications.

🏠Majestic Basement & Ground Triplex
♕5000sqft | 4BHK | High Specifications | Lavish Interiors | Exclusive Lift | Separate Driveway Of 5 Car Parks | Swimming pool | Spa & Sauna | Home Theatre | Gymnasium

🏠Luxurios First Floor & Second Floor
♕400yds | 4BHK | Italian Modular Kitchen | Lavish Interiors | High-end Specs

♕Open For Booking
♕400yds / 4BHK
♕High-End Specifications
♕Exclusive Lifts
♕Separate Driveways
♕Swimming Pool
♕Spa & Sauna
♕Gymnasium
♕Home Theatre
♕Prime Location

Lalit Kaushik

Call On 98183-12077 For Site Visit

http://wa.me/919818312077

Follow @royalerealtorsindia on social media
Checkout Our Other Listings Here
ROYALE REALTORS INDIA

Royale Realtors India – Luxury Real Estate

19 DDA Market, Shanti Niketan, New Delhi, Delhi 110021

***Image used are for reference purposes only.
